name: NomNom (ElishaSummers)
description:
Meet NomNom, our curious serpentine friend -- Are you hungry? NomNom is!

NomNom is a slightly more advanced snake game, and my first itch.io project.

It starts normal, but adds challenges as NomNom eats away.

This is my first published project.  I'm new to game dev, so this is kinda simple; however, I made all the visual assets and did all the programming myself, so I am proud of it.

Enjoy!
